summary: A documentary that explores why African cult and militia leader and indicted war criminal fugitive Joseph Kony needs to be arrested by the end of 2012.
cast: Susan Davis|Shepard Fairey|James Inhofe|Joseph Kony|Santo Okot Lapolo|Norbert Mao|Jim McGovern|Luis Moreno-Ocampo|Jolly Okot|John Prendergast|Gavin Russell|Jason Russell
keywords: controversy|two word title|first of series|first part|part of series
title: Kony 2012
